alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 10:21PM CST until February 26 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Hancock and Claiborne Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River above Tazewell TN. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding of pasture land near Grissom Island begins. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 PM EST Friday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.0 feet on 02/21/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Saturday afternoon at 230 PM EST.
